name: Silver Tower
description:
Silver Tower

In an ancient and nearly abandoned tower high in the mountains, a young child must learn its ancient secrets and escape.

this short narrative game was made as part of the Griffith Film Schools final year project for Games Design.

Controls

  • WSAD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • E to interact with text

Notes

  • there's no menu so you'll have to alt+F4 to quit, sorry.
  • the game has no level select or save system, its quite short though.
  • there's some hidden journal entries around the levels, they're not too off the beaten path and none require backtracking

Credits

  • designer/level designer:  Enrique Arroyo : https://twitter.com/Riquejito 
  • animator: Brittnie Williams : https://mobile.twitter.com/LittleBrittnie
  • programmer: Jayden Cosgrove
